typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PostcodeNummers as string,
		Plaats as string,
		Gemeente as string,
		Provincie as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> excelpostcode
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
excelpostcode sink(input(
		Postcode_key as integer,
		Postcode4 as integer,
		Woonplaats as string,
		Regio as string,
		Gemeente as string,
		Provincie as string,
		Verzorgingsgebied as string,
		Groep1 as string,
		Groep2 as string,
		Groep3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Postcode_key = PostcodeNummers,
		Postcode4 = PostcodeNummers,
		Woonplaats = Plaats,
		Gemeente,
		Provincie
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> RefPostcode
